user_review: Favourite place in the Mont Royal vicinity for dumplings!! They have an elaborate menu for dumplings. Taste is extremely authentic!! We usually order the same Steamed Beef Coriander & Chicken dumplings!! The sauces make the experience even better! The servers are all super helpful, friendly and patient!! Prices are very low for the quality and taste of the dumplings!! We are regulars and eat here very often!

The dumplings here are good, and probably the best thing they offer. Owners are really nice and attentive. Noodles are home made but extraordinarily greasy, there was a large pool of grease under my noodles, hands, everything when I was done, which isn't a particularly pleasant experience. The taste was also 'fine' but not special. And generally everything is just more 'fine' than good, and for the area it is in you are paying full price too, but then it doesn't feel worth it at the end of the day.

This is a cute little spot for dumplings on mont royal. the location is large and clean and the staff is friendly. Lots of seating inside (no outdoor seating though). They accept credit debit and cash. The prices are fair as well for the amount of food and quality you are getting. We ordered the pork buns , fried shrimp&pork dumplings and the lamb &coriander dumplings steamed. Â The pork buns were ok , not much pork inside the filling was mostly an overly sweet sauce and the dough didn't have the right texture way too bread-like (I love pork buns but I didn't really enjoy this). The shrimp&pork fried dumplings were to die for , so juicy fresh and full of flavour (a must order on their menu), the lamb and coriander was pretty good as well just lacked a touch of flavour. They had a lot of choice of dumplings and appetizers. A really good place to curb your dumpling cravings !

Tried this dumpling place recently. Price is fair for the amount of dumplings you get but the taste isn't all that amazing. The sauce was missing ginger and they didn't have the soup dumplings. I had the shrimp, pork, and chive dumplings and my husband had the beef and coriander dumplings. Cute place and awesome location but the food could be way better! Also service was pretty slow which was surprising since our order wasn't very complicated and the place was almost empty.

If could have put 0 I would have.I went to this restaurant with a friend and we waited for 5 minutes standing for someone to serve us and nobody even looked at us or offered to place us even though the place was empty.Nobody told us to choose from any place.Literally the worst welcome I have ever experienced in a restaurant.I will give it another chance but for now I'm disgusted by my experience.
Favourite dumpling restaurant in Montreal. Super fresh, savoury food, and awesome service. 2 awesome vegan dumpling items on the menu. Definitely recommend this restaurant :)
Four stars because the food is good and prices very fair. I want them to succeed! Definitely worth a try...A little hidden gem. Yum.

Service was not good. We walked out because we were not served. We saw 3 pairs of people coming in after us and they were seated and served before we even put in our order. I did notice that there were only 2 servers and they seemed to be lost.
Went here for the first time yesterday - delicious dumplings! We had the pork and chive dumplings, fried. We also had the homemade vegetable noodles, also delicious! Highly recommend!
